Class nPong

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • pongmp.nPong

    java.lang.Runnable

    public class nPong
extends java.lang.Thread
    Main class for initializing the GUI and other elements for multiplayer pong

      • sendData

        public static void sendData(int d,
                            int x,
                            int y,
                            int xs,
                            int ys,
                            int cx)
        Method for sending data to the server
        Parameters:
        d - diameter of the ball
        x - x position of the ball
        y - y position of the ball
        xs - x speed of the ball
        ys - y speed of the ball
        cx - variable for direction of ball so it doesn't get stuck in walls

      • run

        public void run()
        Method that is invoked when a Game thread is initialized an ran

      • update

        public static void update(double d)
        Method that is ran T_UPDATES per second
        Parameters:
        d - the delta of how close the loop was to optimal time between updates
